0.5.8.name: wordpress/in-text-seo-internal-link-building
0.5.8.description:
NotedLinks is a FREE rule based in-text link manager that allows you to automatically build internal links on your website.

The plugin links keywords and phrases in your posts and comments based on the rules you define linking keywords to urls. It's free and a good altenrative to SEO Smart Links plugin with the extra feature of link recomendation.

This is a great solution to:

  • Improve internal link building
  • Add affiliate links to other sites
  • Improve SEO

Everything happens automatically. You can also setup your own settings to limit the number of links per post or links with the same keyword.

BONUS FEATURE

The plugin also suggests keywords on your posts that should be linked to specific internal posts to improve your SEO. This functionality only works for medium and big sites, but it's free to try for anyone. Learn more on the Notedlinks website.
